document_data.name: Citron
document_data.mainbody: '''Citrons''' were a type of tree-grown citrus fruit found in the Realms.
document_data.Availability:
Places in the Realms where citrons were known to be cultivated included:
* In the [[Crowded Sea]], citron was cultivated on the islands of [[Masud Jazayir]].
* In the [[Unapproachable East]], citrons were a major fruit crop of the nation of [[Thay]].

Variants.Mir: A species of citron that grew on [[Skyport]], in the public park known as the [[Terrace of Tranquility]]. The fruit of this tree was delightfully sweet and a staple of poorer citzens' diets.<ref>{{Cite dungeon/36/The Sea of Sorrow|52}}

document_data.Notable Orange Products: * [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|''Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue'']] sold candied citron imported from Thay at a standard price of 10 [[gold piece]]s per {{SI|1|ounce|long=yes}} in its "Aurora's Larder" section. Dried citrons were also featured in the [[fruitcake]]s that the catalogue sold.
